Brian Maier Jr.

good developer, better designer, excellent dude

Hello! I'm Brian, a designer/front-end developer from the midwest that adheres to simplicity and usability.

I am currently a Front-end Developer at The Learning House where we focus on eLearning for small to mid range colleges. I'm not currently accepting work but please feel free to connect with me through various social networks. Enjoy!
